name: VNGeneratePersonSegmentationRequest
desc: An object that produces a matte image for a person that it finds in the input image.

items.name: var outputPixelFormat: OSType
items.desc: The pixel format of the output image.

items.name: var qualityLevel: VNGeneratePersonSegmentationRequest.QualityLevel
items.desc: A value that indicates how the request balances accuracy and performance.

items.name: enum VNGeneratePersonSegmentationRequest.QualityLevel
items.desc: Constants that define the levels of quality for a person segmentation request.

items.name: var results: [VNPixelBufferObservation]?
items.desc: The results of the segmentation request.

items.name: class VNPixelBufferObservation
items.desc: An object that represents an image that an image analysis request produces.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a generate person segmentation request.

items.name: init(completionHandler: VNRequestCompletionHandler?)
items.desc: Creates a generate person segmentation request with a completion handler.
